useCase.name: Access Item Definitions
useCase.description: User wants to view definitions for a specific item.

preconditions.precondition: User has opened the ItemView in the GUI.

successEndConditions.condition: Definitions for the item are displayed successfully.

useCase.trigger: User triggers the open event for the ItemView.

mainSequence.step: GUI adds the ItemView to the StackView.
GUI requests definitions from the Dictionary.
